channel.title: Aj on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in Aj on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: Food Chronicles
item.author: ssphugo@srkn.anonaddy.com (Srikanth Perinkulam)
item.description: With M&S back to MD I’m the Chef de Cuisine full-time. While I love taking on that role, since it gives me extra time to listen to podcasts, it’s been challenging cooking to the taste buds of two octogenarians both quality and quantity wise!
